content:
Coming back to close the loop. ChatGPT fixed this for me. The long and short of it is that it was a password hiccup with google's smtp server rejecting what it got for a password.

After following several different paths trying to fix it, these steps worked (but I have no clue why): 1) I deleted the existing google smtp entry from Thunderbird leaving only smtp from other providers. 2) I then went through Google's machinations and generated a new password. 3) I checked that my google smtp was set up correctly BUT changed the authentiation from Normal password to Oauth2 (then checked that all my IMAP and POP accounts use OAuth2) 4) I sent a test email to and from myself and was prompted for a password then supplied the google generated one.

The test email went through so I sent all the saved drafts I had and they all went through.

What I gleaned from this is that Google may (or may not) have changed and no longer allows normal password as an option. I can't say for sure, but that's what I think I learned out of the process from ChatGPT.
creator: rabbithutch1

content:
Ci sono diverse segnalazioni simili alla tua in queste ore. Sto provando a identificare meglio il problema.

Raccolgo le informazioni disponibili a questo indirizzo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/questions/1528941

Se possibile prova a fornire le seguenti informazioni

  1. Aprendo una delle email problematiche dalla webmail, il messaggio Ã¨ leggibile?
  2. Versione di Thunderbird
  3. Versione del sistema operativo
  4. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  5. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  6. Estensioni installate
  7. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  8. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  9. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Kijk dit artikel om te zien hoe instellingen voor POP-servers aangepast kunnen worden: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/kan-geen-berichten-ontvangen. De juiste gegevens staan op: https://www.ziggo.nl/klantenservice/e-mail/serverinstellingen
